MMS_SAVE_FILE_HASHES_SCRIPT

 [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 this script downloads MMS files and saves the MD5 hashes for comparison with pySPEDAS

MMS_SPD_PGS_SOLAR_WIND

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 PROCEDURE:
         mms_spd_pgs_solar_wind

 PURPOSE:
         this script creates multiple figures for solar wind intervals
         for comparing Mitsuo's binning with bulk velocity subtraction
         with PGS with bulk velocity subtraction

MMS_SPD_SLICE2D_VALIDATION

 [Previous Routine] [List of Routines] 
 NAME:
         mms_spd_slice2d_validation
         
 PURPOSE:
         Creates plots for comparing FPI and HPCA slices 
         from spd_slice2d for 0-300 eV ions when there's 
         a bi-directional, field-aligned beam observed by 
         both instruments around: 2017-09-10/09:32:20
